summary: Fredora Islands. Once peaceful land ruled by Tyrok. When the dragons returned the land was devoured by darkness and the undead roam once beautiful and peaceful lands of Fredora. Bandits, attacking everyone and everything, sinking ships, killing inocents ...
descriptionHtml:
CURRENTLY WOORKING ON

*Massive keep (gonna take at least one more month to complete)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Version 0.6.0 - Dawn of Darkness (Beta)

- This is very much a beta version. I would really appreciate any feedback you can give.

Known issues / missing features

-Navmesh is incomplete (Followers might get stuck)
-Terrain issues (Hard to get out of water at some places, not player proof, yet)
-Boss fight missing (will be epic, hopefuly)
-Layout is complete but clutter (barrels, flora etc.) missing

*New island
*Darkness devoured everything

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Version 0.5.2

*Tyrok\'s Tomb is finished (Double door has been unlocked)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Version 0.5.1

*New Island (Don\'t Swim, go through underwater passage)
-Not the final version

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Version 0.4

*Difficulty tweaks
*Added flora
*Tiny new island
*Added fog
*Landscaping (should be easier to get out of water)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Version 0.3

*New Island
*More Navmesh updates
*Had to move mudcrabs...too fierce...were killing bandits
*Too much free time...

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

Version 0.2 (Now with 100% more fish !)

*Navmesh updated (followers now work)
*Added critters
*Added Wildlife (mudcrabs, discusting creatures)
*Added Map-Marker (north of Dawnstar)

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -

This is the first version of Fredora Islands.I plan on adding more islands in the future.Every time I finish a new island i will update the file.

To get there just take a boat north of Dawnstar, click on the hatch and ta-da.

Enjoy.
author: MCGamerCZ

files.name: Fredora Islands - Dawn of Darkness - Beta
